Package com.opera.core.systems.model

Objects used for storing data, but which doesn't do anything themselves.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Canvas
    A canvas object to use in taking screenshots of Opera's viewport.
    ColorResult
    Represents a result from screen watcher that identifies if a the color we were looking for matched, and number of matches if any, matches are tagged with an ID.
    OperaColor
    The OperaColor class is used to encapsulate colours in the default sRGB colour space for determining colour characteristics in screen captures.
    RuntimeNode
    Holds a tree of references to runtimes.
    ScreenCaptureReply
    Represents a screen capture reply.
    ScreenCaptureReply.Builder
    A builder for creating screen capture reply instances.
    ScriptResult
    Holds the result of a script execution, namely for an object.

Package com.opera.core.systems.model Description

Objects used for storing data, but which doesn't do anything themselves.
